DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect multiple dos DVS SR paroxetine pharmacokinetics single dose desipramine healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Effects DVS SR Paroxetine Pharmacokinetics Desipramine Healthy Subjects
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman 18 55 year age Healthy determine investigator basis medical history physical examination , laboratory test result , vital sign , 12lead electrocardiogram ( ECG ) History nonsmoker least 1 year Other inclusion apply . Presence history disorder significant cardiovascular , hepatic , renal , gastrointestinal , endocrine , immunologic , dermatologic , hematologic , neurologic condition , severe condition ear , eye throat ( glaucoma increase intraocular pressure ) psychiatric disease Known suspect alcohol abuse consumption 2 standard unit per day within past 6 month Use overthecounter , prescription , hormonal therapy investigational medication within 30 day study day1 end study Other exclusion apply .
